dos_format.message: PBS file is DOS file format

mac_format.message: PBS file is Mac file format

misplaced_shebang.message: shebang line should be the first line, this is ignored
misplaced_shebang.remedy: move line to the top of the file, or remove

missing_shebang.message: missing shebang, it should be the first line of the script
missing_shebang.remedy: add a shebang line at the top of the file, i.e., '#!/bin/bash -l'

indented_pbs_dir.message: PBS directive should not be indented

malformed_pbs_dir.remedy: directive should have the form '#PBS <option> <value>', see qsub man page for more information

misplace_pbs_dir.message: PBS directive should be at the file, just below the shebang, this is ignored
misplace_pbs_dir.remedy: move line to its intended location, or remove it

no_script.remedy: add some work to the job

invalid_join.message: value '{val}' is invalid for the -j join option
invalid_join.remedy: values can be 'oe', 'eo', or 'n', see qsub documentation

invalid_keep.message: value '{val}' is invalid for the -k keep option
invalid_keep.remedy: values can be 'o', 'e', 'oe', 'eo', or 'n', see qsub documentation

invalid_mail_event.message: value '{val}' is invalid for the -m mail event option
invalid_mail_event.remedy: see the qsub man page for valid values

invalid_job_name.remedy: see the qsub man page for valid values

invalid_project_name.remedy: see the qsub man page for valid values

invalid_queue_name.remedy: see the qsub man page for valid values

ppn_no_number.remedy: ppn (processes per node) should be a positive integer

gpus_no_number.remedy: gpus (GPUs per node) should be a positive integer

invalid_mem_format.message: '{size}' is not a valid memory specification
invalid_mem_format.remedy: memory is specified as a number, with units b, kb, mb, gb, or tb

invalid_pmem_format.message: '{size}' is not a valid process memory specification
invalid_pmem_format.remedy: process memory is specified as a number, with units b, kb, mb, gb, or tb

invalid_mail_address.message: '{address}' does not seem to be a valid email address

unknown_resource_spec.message: '{spec}' is an unknown resource identifier for -l
unknown_resource_spec.remedy: check the documentation on resource specfiicatinos

multiple_procs_specs.message: more than one procs resource specification was given
multiple_procs_specs.remedy: provide only a single procs resource specified per job

non_integer_procs.message: '{procs}' is not integer for procs resource specification
non_integer_procs.remedy: number of processors should be integer

insufficient_node_pmem.message: no nodes available with {mem} of RAM
insufficient_node_pmem.remedy: check pmem and ppn in resource specification

insufficient_nodes_mem.message: insufficient nodes ({nodes}) available with {mem} of RAM
insufficient_nodes_mem.remedy: check nodes, pmem and ppn in resource specification

insufficient_mem.message: insufficient nodes for a total of {mem} RAM
insufficient_mem.remedy: check nodes and mem in resource specification

both_mem_pmem_specs.message: both mem and pmem resources specified
both_mem_pmem_specs.remedy: check that you want both mem and pmem specifications

insufficient_nodes.remedy: reduce the number of requested nodes

insufficient_ppn_nodes.remedy: check specifications of compute nodes for number of cores

no_credit_account.message: no credit account can be found
no_credit_account.remedy: verify that you have to acquire credits to compute on this system

no_default_credit_account.message: no explicit credit account specified, and no default found
no_default_credit_account.remedy: verify that you have to acquire credits to compute on this system

unknown_credit_account.message: no credit account with name {account} can be found
unknown_credit_account.remedy: verify that credit account exists, and you can access it

insufficient_credits.message: credit account {account} may have insufficient credits to run this job
insufficient_credits.remedy: verify the credit account balance, and acquire more credits if necessary
